verses.verse: God <S%H430><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> "Arise, <S%H6965><s%> go up <S%H5927><s%> to Bethel, <S%H1008><s%> and live <S%H3427><s%> there. <S%H6213><s%> Make there an altar <S%H4196><s%> to God, <S%H410><s%> who appeared <S%H7200><s%> to you when you fled <S%H1272><s%> from the face <S%H6440><s%> of Esau <S%H6215><s%> your brother. <S%H251><s%>"

Then Jacob <S%H3290><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to his household, <S%H1004><s%> and to all who were with him, <S%H5493><s%> "Put away the foreign <S%H5236><s%> gods <S%H430><s%> that are among you, <S%H8432><s%> purify <S%H2891><s%> yourselves, <S%H2498><s%> change your garments. <S%H8071><s%>

Let us arise, <S%H6965><s%> and go up <S%H5927><s%> to Bethel. <S%H1008><s%> I will make <S%H6213><s%> there an altar <S%H4196><s%> to God, <S%H410><s%> who answered <S%H6030><s%> me in the day <S%H3117><s%> of my distress, <S%H6869><s%> and was with me in the way <S%H1870><s%> which I went. <S%H1980><s%>"

They gave <S%H5414><s%> to Jacob <S%H3290><s%> all the foreign <S%H5236><s%> gods <S%H430><s%> which were in their hands, <S%H3027><s%> and the rings <S%H5141><s%> which were in their ears; <S%H241><s%> and Jacob <S%H3290><s%> hid <S%H2934><s%> them under the oak <S%H424><s%> which was by Shechem. <S%H7927><s%>

They traveled, <S%H5265><s%> and a terror <S%H2847><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> was on the cities <S%H5892><s%> that were around them, <S%H5439><s%> and they didn't <S%H7291><s%> pursue the <S%H310><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> of Jacob. <S%H3290><s%>

So Jacob <S%H3290><s%> came <S%H935><s%> to Luz <S%H3870><s%> (that is, <S%H1008><s%> Bethel), which is in the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan, <S%H3667><s%> he and all the people who were with him. <S%H5971><s%>

He built <S%H1129><s%> an altar <S%H4196><s%> there, <S%H7121><s%> and called the place <S%H4725><s%> El Beth El; <S%H416><s%> because there God <S%H430><s%> was revealed <S%H1540><s%> to him, <S%H1272><s%> when he fled from the face <S%H6440><s%> of his brother. <S%H251><s%>

Deborah, <S%H1683><s%> Rebekah <S%H7259><s%>'s nurse, <S%H3243><s%> died, <S%H4191><s%> and she was buried <S%H6912><s%> below Bethel <S%H1008><s%> under the oak; <S%H437><s%> and its name <S%H8034><s%> was called <S%H7121><s%> Allon Bacuth. <S%H439><s%>
God <S%H430><s%> appeared <S%H7200><s%> to Jacob <S%H3290><s%> again, <S%H935><s%> when he came from Paddan Aram, <S%H6307><s%> and blessed him. <S%H1288><s%>

God <S%H430><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to him, <S%H8034><s%> "Your name is Jacob. <S%H3290><s%> Your name <S%H8034><s%> shall not be Jacob <S%H3290><s%> any more, <S%H8034><s%> but your name will <S%H7121><s%> be Israel. <S%H3478><s%>" He named <S%H8034><s%> him <S%H7121><s%> Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

God <S%H430><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to him, <S%H410><s%> "I am God Almighty. <S%H7706><s%> Be fruitful <S%H6509><s%> and multiply. <S%H7235><s%> A nation <S%H1471><s%> and a company <S%H6951><s%> of nations <S%H1471><s%> will be from you, <S%H4428><s%> and kings will come <S%H3318><s%> out of your body. <S%H2504><s%>

The land <S%H776><s%> which I gave <S%H5414><s%> to Abraham <S%H85><s%> and Isaac, <S%H3327><s%> I will give it <S%H5414><s%> to you, <S%H2233><s%> and to your seed after you <S%H310><s%> will I give <S%H5414><s%> the land. <S%H776><s%>"
God <S%H430><s%> went up <S%H5927><s%> from him in the place <S%H4725><s%> where he spoke with him. <S%H1696><s%>

Jacob <S%H3290><s%> set up <S%H5324><s%> a pillar <S%H4676><s%> in the place <S%H4725><s%> where he spoke <S%H1696><s%> with him, <S%H4678><s%> a pillar of stone. <S%H68><s%> He poured <S%H5258><s%> out a drink offering <S%H5262><s%> on it, <S%H3332><s%> and poured oil on it. <S%H8081><s%>
Jacob <S%H3290><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of the place <S%H4725><s%> where God <S%H430><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> with him <S%H1008><s%> "Bethel."

They traveled <S%H5265><s%> from Bethel. <S%H1008><s%> There was still <S%H5750><s%> some <S%H3530><s%> distance <S%H776><s%> to come <S%H935><s%> to Ephrath, <S%H672><s%> and Rachel <S%H7354><s%> travailed. <S%H3205><s%> She had hard <S%H7185><s%> labor. <S%H3205><s%>
When she was in hard <S%H7185><s%> labor, <S%H3205><s%> the midwife <S%H3205><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to her, <S%H3372><s%> "Don't be afraid, for now you will have another son. <S%H1121><s%>"

It happened, <S%H5315><s%> as her soul was departing <S%H3318><s%> (for she died <S%H4191><s%>), that she named <S%H8034><s%> him <S%H7121><s%> Benoni, <S%H1126><s%> but his father <S%H1><s%> named <S%H8034><s%> him Benjamin. <S%H1144><s%>
Rachel <S%H7354><s%> died, <S%H4191><s%> and was buried <S%H6912><s%> in the way <S%H1870><s%> to Ephrath <S%H672><s%> (the same is Bethlehem <S%H1035><s%>).

Jacob <S%H3290><s%> set <S%H5324><s%> up a pillar <S%H4676><s%> on her grave. <S%H6900><s%> The same is the Pillar <S%H4678><s%> of Rachel <S%H7354><s%>'s grave <S%H6900><s%> to this day. <S%H3117><s%>
Israel <S%H3478><s%> traveled, <S%H5265><s%> and spread <S%H5186><s%> his tent <S%H168><s%> beyond <S%H1973><s%> the tower <S%H4026><s%> of Eder. <S%H4029><s%>

It happened, <S%H3478><s%> while Israel lived <S%H7931><s%> in that land, <S%H776><s%> that Reuben <S%H7205><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> and lay <S%H7901><s%> with Bilhah, <S%H1090><s%> his father <S%H1><s%>'s concubine, <S%H6370><s%> and Israel <S%H3478><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> of it. <S%H1121><s%> Now the sons of Jacob <S%H3290><s%> were twelve. <S%H8147><s%>

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Leah: <S%H3812><s%> Reuben <S%H7205><s%> (Jacob <S%H3290><s%>'s firstborn <S%H1060><s%>), Simeon, <S%H8095><s%> Levi, <S%H3878><s%> Judah, <S%H3063><s%> Issachar, <S%H3485><s%> and Zebulun. <S%H2074><s%>
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Rachel: <S%H7354><s%> Joseph <S%H3130><s%> and Benjamin. <S%H1144><s%>
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Bilhah <S%H1090><s%> (Rachel <S%H7354><s%>'s handmaid <S%H8198><s%>): Dan <S%H1835><s%> and Naphtali. <S%H5321><s%>

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Zilpah <S%H2153><s%> (Leah <S%H3812><s%>'s handmaid <S%H8198><s%>): Gad <S%H1410><s%> and Asher. <S%H836><s%> These are the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> who were born <S%H3205><s%> to him in Paddan Aram. <S%H6307><s%>

Jacob <S%H3290><s%> came <S%H935><s%> to Isaac <S%H3327><s%> his father, <S%H1><s%> to Mamre, <S%H4471><s%> to Kiriath Arba <S%H7153><s%> (which is Hebron <S%H2275><s%>), where Abraham <S%H85><s%> and Isaac <S%H3327><s%> lived as foreigners. <S%H1481><s%>
The days <S%H3117><s%> of Isaac <S%H3327><s%> were one hundred <S%H3967><s%> eighty <S%H8084><s%> years. <S%H8141><s%>

Isaac <S%H3327><s%> gave up the spirit, <S%H1478><s%> and died, <S%H4191><s%> and was gathered <S%H622><s%> to his people, <S%H5971><s%> old <S%H2205><s%> and full <S%H7649><s%> of days. <S%H3117><s%> Esau <S%H6215><s%> and Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> his sons, <S%H1121><s%> buried him. <S%H6912><s%>
